title: Introduction to C Programming
description: Master the basics of C programming language and learn to write efficient and reliable code.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
description: Dive into the world of algorithms and learn how to solve complex problems efficiently.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
description: Explore the fundamentals of C++ programming language for Data Structures and Algorithms.

title: Basic Data Structures
description: Learn about essential data structures and how to implement them in practical scenarios.

title: Introduction to OOP Python
description: Get a solid understanding of Object-Oriented Programming in Python and its applications.

title: Software Engineering
description: Explore the principles of software engineering and best practices for building robust applications.

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
description: Dive into Amazon Web Services (AWS) and learn about cloud computing solutions and services.

title: Database (MySQL)
description: Gain proficiency in MySQL, one of the world's most popular relational database management systems.

title: Problem-Solving Part
description: Hone your problem-solving skills through challenging exercises and algorithmic thinking.
